checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/promtail' should be added.
AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/cri-autoconfig' should be added.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.

Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
